title: failed to run './x.py build' on Ubunbu docker container based on s390x platform

labels.name: T-bootstrap
labels.description: Relevant to the bootstrap subteam: Rust's build system (x.py and src/bootstrap)

body:
Hi,

As topic said, I failed to run './x.py build' on Ubunbu docker container based on s390x platform. Below is my platform info and the detailed error.

```
root@2005b3ffa5b1:/rust# uname -a
Linux 2005b3ffa5b1 4.4.0-59.80.el7_2.ssc_k_1_0.8.s390x #1 SMP Mon Jul 31 15:55:57 EDT 2017 s390x s390x s390x GNU/Linux
root@2005b3ffa5b1:/rust# uname -m
s390x
root@2005b3ffa5b1:/rust# uname -s
Linux

root@2005b3ffa5b1:/rust# ./x.py build
Updating submodules
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "./x.py", line 20, in <module>
    bootstrap.main()
  File "/rust/src/bootstrap/bootstrap.py", line 763, in main
    bootstrap()
  File "/rust/src/bootstrap/bootstrap.py", line 737, in bootstrap
    build.update_submodules()
  File "/rust/src/bootstrap/bootstrap.py", line 637, in update_submodules
    run(["git", "submodule", "-q", "sync"], cwd=self.rust_root, verbose=self.verbose)
  File "/rust/src/bootstrap/bootstrap.py", line 143, in run
    ret = subprocess.Popen(args, **kwargs)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/subprocess.py", line 711, in __init__
    errread, errwrite)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/subprocess.py", line 1343, in _execute_child
    raise child_exception
OSError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory
```
